subject: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are ready to give you a loan
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING):
$248,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this user-friendly form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://tmgbood.com/
